data.title: [json] Completing a JSON suggestion enters snippet mode
data.body: If you complete a JSON suggestion, you need to press Enter once to accept the suggestion and another time to exit the snippet mode.

data.title: Salsa: werid rendering of hover for arguments with jsdoc
Salsa: bogus intelli-sense proposal
Salsa is weird around assigning twice to the same member
`end of central directory record signature not found` during extension install
Salsa: d.ts files are not respected
data.body:
1. Enable salsa on a js project (e.g. vscode-smoketest-express)
2. tsd install node
3. I do not get node instelli-sense (e.g in app.js of vscode-smoketest-express invoke inteli-sense for `path.`)

Am I missing some configuration here?

data.title: Show the "Windows" menu on Windows and Linux too

milestone.title: Backlog
milestone.description: Work not yet planned for a specific release.

data.body: while testing #1881 on linux, I was never seeing a Windows menu in the menu bar. I suppose it should be there, right?

data.title: Dark+theme: cannot distinguish current selection from write access occurrence
data.body:
Using the default Dark+theme.

Nothing selected but the whole word appears selected because it is a `write occurrence`.

![write-occurrence](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/172399/12586085/1a579954-c44f-11e5-9d6b-60859746a04d.png)

Word selected in a comment, looks visually the same as the write occurrence.
![selection](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/172399/12586088/1dc85128-c44f-11e5-8478-58af5eae2098.png)

data.title: Salse: inferred proposals not visually distinct from global identifiers
data.body:
I would expect some visual difference between `name`, `lastName` and the rest of proposals

![screen shot 2016-01-26 at 17 02 02](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1926584/12585978/abfe74e6-c44e-11e5-928f-7ad96c42a798.png)

data.title: Focus decoration go away on hover
data.body:
I've seen this on the activity bar and actions only.

![bug](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/22350/12585566/e45e3cc4-c44c-11e5-85ac-88a26ce7ae68.gif)

It's very distracting and doesn't feel natural at all. Especially not on OS X.

![bug](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/22350/12585710/7c82e41e-c44d-11e5-82f2-a9114b1b6a17.gif)

Related to #2145

data.title: Hover can get very large and should rather allow for scrolling
data.body:
- if you have a JS Doc with lots of markdown, the hover just cuts off parts of it
- ideally the hover would just have a fixed maximum size and then show scrollbars that I can use

![hover](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/900690/12585595/09f9a374-c44d-11e5-89f0-1b6ef0b53442.gif)

data.title: Salsa: formatOnType does not respect current line indendtiation
data.body:
1. js workspace, have salsa enabled
2. "editor.formatOnType": true
3. The format on type is too aggrressive and does not respect current indentiation. This is especially noticable when trying to create object literals
4. if salse is disabled this works nicely

data.title: Activity bar focus indication is too subtle
data.body:
I find it very hard to notice when the focus is in the activity bar. We need something stronger there. Maybe try white? Or maybe some other affordance at all, since this is too far away from the user's eye.

![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/22350/12585511/a901ed88-c44c-11e5-8562-51ba91341176.png)

Additionally, notice how the opacity of the _unselected_ viewlet icons affects the focus indication. The explorer's focus indication is brighter than the search one. They should be exactly the same.

![bug](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/22350/12585360/06641376-c44c-11e5-9027-6c7dc7cd9f3c.gif)

Related to #2145

ping @bgashler1

data.title: Markdown hover: Command action does not work
data.body:
- I have a method in TS with a command as JSDoc ([hello](curserDown))
- I hover over the method and click on the command

=> command does not execute, instead the editor closes and seems to want to open a document with that URI.

Does the command link only work in extensions providing a hover?

data.title: Regression in inputting Korean
data.body:
- Press g k s r m f (it should be "")
- Press space

> You get ""

data.title: Up and down arrows should jump through splitview headers
data.body: It would _totally_ **kick** **_ass**_.

data.title: Left and right arrow keys seem to do the same thing in the splitview header
data.body: They both seem to both expand and collapse. I would expect left to only collapse and right to only expand.

data.title: Expanding splitview with the arrow keys shouldn't focus content
Failed preLaunchTask's should abort debugger launch
data.body: Currently errors in preLaunchTask's are silently ignored. This is a big problem for any compiled language which uses preLaunchTask to compile the code as this means that any build errors are ignored.

data.title: Bad contrast when salsa is broken
data.body:
This shade of red looks broken on the blue background as it is hardly visible
Nowhere else in the status bar do we use this red color

![screen shot 2016-01-26 at 16 32 27](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1926584/12585027/7c4b8698-c44a-11e5-8724-244b27764859.png)

data.title: Cannot distinguish editor in output pane from the other editors
data.body:
Testing #2145 

Select text in the output window.

NVDA reports the current focus (NVDA+Tab) as

> Editor content  edit  focused  multi line

You cannot distingush the output pane from a content editor.

data.title: Cannot tab out of Output pane with accessibility Mode on
data.body:
Testing #2145

Once text is selected in the output window you cannot tab out of the output pane using the TAB key.

data.title: [json] JSON could complete identifier with quotes
data.body:
I often start typing with having quotes, like `foo` instead of `"foo"`. 24x7 Intellisense could propose that identifier but with quotes to make my life easy

![screen shot 2016-01-26 at 16 29 29](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1794099/12584908/fdf34b32-c449-11e5-83aa-5417174a3342.png)

data.body: When you have a link in the markdown/html preview without target=_blank it opens within that iframe.

data.title: Screen reader skips characters when using cursor right/left
data.body:
Testing #2258
Position cursor on the line:

>    "files.autoSave": "afterDelay",

Press cursor right. The screen reader reads `"ii` (the f is lost and the i is doubled)

data.title: Provide a way to instantiate an Emitter from an extension
data.body: I think it would be nice to give extension writers a helper class to implement the onDidChange method for the content provider. Otherwise you end up having to write lots of boiler plate code to manage listeners and I do like the API and use of Emitter a lot.
